1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old orphan who lives in a careless orphanage.

Jack is a massive fan of the Australian Oscar Nominated Actress Margot Robbie (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3053338/medi...) who was in such films as Birds Of Prey, Wolf Of Wall Street And I Tonya. You love everything about her, her blonde hair, her nice personality, her glowing skin and body, her beautifully sculpted legs and of course HER FEET (you have a foot fetish)

You wish you can leave this place and be with Margot Robbie. One night you are actually desperate enough to wish on a star and wish that you can be with her and you don’t care how (even though you should).

The next morning you wake up in a strange envoirmemt....

154.content:
You are standing on a strange soft surface that feels like silk. Jack looks around and starts to see cameras and large lights around him. Jack then realises that he is the exact same size as an Ant.

Jack panics has he doesn’t know how he got here and what he is gonna do until here some familiar sounding voices.

DIRECTOR: Okay Margot your gonna pose naked onto the bed and wait for your co-star to arrive.

MARGOT: Okay just don’t make me look bad.

DIRECTOR: (Laughing nervously) of course not.

JACK: HOLY SHIT ITS MARGOT FUCKING ROBBIE, i can’t believe it my wish actually came true.... okay I wasn’t expected to be small but still I get to see my crush in person, AND A GIANTESS.

Margot is wearing a soft robe in a movie set bedroom at a studio stage. She must be starring in the erotic thriller she is producing, she apparently hired a first time director for a favour to a friend. She walks towards the bed which you are at and unties her robe belt.

Jack is left in absolute awe as Margot flashes her beautifully sculpted body in front of her. She is wearing small panties but she has no problem showing off her huge tits.

Margot gos to sit on the bed and....
